_CPhidget_Timestamp Struct Reference
[Phidget Common]


Data Fields

int seconds

Detailed Description

Timestamp structure - usually initialized to 0.

Field Documentation

int _CPhidget_Timestamp::seconds

Number of seconds since timing began

int _CPhidget_Timestamp::microseconds

Number of microseconds since last second passed - range is 0 - 999999
